variable.name: what
variable.expression: groovyScript("def result=''; def params=\"${_1}\"; if(params != null && params.size() > 0) {params = params.replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList();for(i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {result+=' @param ' + params[i] + ((i < params.size() - 1) ? '\\n\\b' : '')}}; return result", methodParameters())
